attributes.action: Legalise cannabis for medical and recreational use
attributes.additional_details: Free up prisons by legalise cannabis it would help our youths not get criminal records also would help strain on our police services
attributes.background: Change law to legalise cannabis this would free up our prisons and stop youth getting criminal records

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the below petitions we have open on this topic:

Legalize cannabis for recreational and medical use
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575625

Allow the public to vote on the legalisation of cannabis
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/580806
